rows.label: qst701405_msg0001
rows.name: This is... a secret book on glasswork.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0002
rows.name:
It records the knowledge and
techniques of processing,
down to the finest details.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0003
rows.name:
Wait a minute. Did this
Thales person come all the
way here to bury this?

rows.label: qst701405_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, maybe he buried it, or
maybe he came here to dig it
up. We don't know for certain.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0005
rows.name:
Recalling Sharla-san's words, it's
certain that he was concerned about the
attack on Iira by Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0006
rows.name:
This is just speculation, but he may have
feared that traditional techniques and
knowledge would be lost in the fires of war.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0007
rows.name:
As a result, he unfortunately
encountered the attack on
Torigo Village...

rows.label: qst701405_msg0009
rows.name:
So... should we bury it again? It's
better if it's not in Iira, right?

rows.label: qst701405_msg0010
rows.name:
No, this secret book... I want
to give it to Sharla-san.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0011
rows.name: She has to decide what to do with it.
